title: Hybrid Science Education Design Based on Learning Preferences of Generation Z and Alpha

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Environment enabling real-time collaboration and multimedia content creation using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners collaborate on science projects from planning to execution using digital tools (video conferencing, collaboration platforms) in hybrid environments.
Learners strengthen data analysis competencies by solving real-world science problems using simulation software and virtual lab tools.
Learners produce video/infographic portfolios incorporating peer feedback to visually and practically communicate science concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
